data.program_content: We are excited to announce that Sea Indonesia is now partnering with five universities in Indonesia and offering a merit-based scholarship to bright Indonesian students. This scholarship is our commitment to give back to the community by empowering youth through education. Through this scholarship, we hope to provide talented students with the opportunity to pursue a bachelor’s degree and solve the talent-gap issue in the technology industry in Indonesia.
data.freshman_program:
Requirements:

  • Indonesian citizen
  • A first-year student majoring in an eligible major in Sea's partner university
  • Not having any other scholarships or work commitments with other organizations
  • Maintain a minimum of 3.5/4.0 cumulative GPA throughout the study

Benefits:

  • Full tuition fee and monthly stipend all the way to the completion of the 4th year of study
  • Laptop
  • Internship opportunity in Sea Businesses (Garena, Shopee, Airpay)
  • Development program
data.senior_program:
Requirements:

  • Indonesian citizen
  • A final-year student majoring in an eligible major in Sea's partner university with a minimum cumulative GPA 3.5/4.0
  • Not having any other scholarships or work commitments with other organizations

Benefits:

  • Full tuition fee and monthly stipend for final year
  • Internship opportunity in Sea Businesses (Garena, Shopee, Airpay)
  • Development program
data.faq_content:
How do I know if my application progresses to the next stage?

We will announce the selected candidates who get invited to the next on-campus interview on our website by 10 September. Please stay tuned!


What does a Sea Scholarship cover?

We provide wide-range opportunities for selected scholars to join our attachment and development programs, such as self-training, office visit, sharing session with our CEO, internship in one of our entities, etc. Selected scholars receive:

  • A monthly stipend allowance
  • Full tuition fee
  • Laptop (Sea Freshman Scholarship Program only)


What kind of development programs do I get during my scholarship period?

You will have the opportunity to attend various programs that will be held differently each year, such as mentoring, sharing/group discussion, workshop/seminar, etc.


Can I submit more than one application?

No, you can only submit one application.


Do I still eligible to apply for the scholarship if my University is not Sea's partner universities?

No, you can only apply for this scholarship if you have already accepted in one of Sea's partner universities.


I won’t have my education documents before the application deadline. Will my application be ineligible?

You need to upload your education documents e.g student card and/or any document as a proof that you are accepted in Sea’s partner universities, academic transcript (for Sea Senior Scholarship Program) prior to the application deadline so that your application can be processed. For academic transcript, for example, if you are currently in 6th semester, you must submit your latest GPA in 6th semester. If you haven’t received the result yet, please submit your academic result in 5th semester. However, the latest GPA in 6th semester must be submitted prior to the final interview.


Who pays for my accommodation?

Scholars are responsible for finding and paying for their own accommodation. Sea is not responsible to pay for your accommodation.


Will I get reimbursed for the development fee and semester fee? How's the process of reimbursement?

Yes, we also cover your development fee (ad-hoc), alongside the tuition fee. As for semester fee, we pay only for on-going semester fee e.g. 1st semester onwards (for Sea Freshman Scholarship Program) and 7th semester onwards (for Sea Senior Scholarship Program).


Can I accept another funding alongside Sea Scholarship?

Scholars are not permitted to have another sponsor for their study other than Sea Scholarship.


Am I required to work with Sea upon completing my study?

You are required to go through recruitment process and if you pass the process, you are guaranteed to explore an exciting start to your career in Sea.
